definitions.definition: The (thing) here ( used in indicating something or someone nearby ) .
examples: This classroom is where I learned to read and write.

definitions.definition: The known (thing) ( used in indicating something or someone just mentioned ) .
examples: They give the appearance of knowing what they're doing. It's this appearance that lets them get away with so much.

definitions.definition: The known (thing) ( used in indicating something or someone about to be mentioned ) .
examples: When asked what he wanted for his birthday, he gave this reply: “[…]”

definitions.definition: A known (thing) ( used in first mentioning a person or thing that the speaker does not think is known to the audience ) . Compare with " a certain ... ".
examples: I met this woman the other day who's allergic to wheat. I didn't even know that was possible!
There's just this nervous mannerism that Bob has with his hands, and it drives me crazy.

definitions.definition: Designates the current or next instance.
examples: I plan to go to London this Friday.

main_definition: The (thing) here ( used in indicating something or someone nearby ) .
secondary_definitions: The known (thing) ( used in indicating something or someone just mentioned ) .
The known (thing) ( used in indicating something or someone about to be mentioned ) .
( informal ) A known (thing) ( used in first mentioning a person or thing that the speaker does not think is known to the audience ) . Compare with " a certain ... ".
( of a time reference ) Designates the current or next instance.
